settings.content: WAM! (Website Accessibility Mode) is not only your guard to a wafe, WCAG compliant experience, but it helps your customers of all needs have a great experience on your site.

settings.label: Enable WAM?
settings.info: This will not allow bulk testing tools to work in evaluating your site.

settings.label: Enable blocking for iframe bulk testers?
settings.info: This will not allow bulk testing tools to work in evaluating your site.

settings.label: Turn on console debugger?
settings.info: This will make it so you can view all the errors in the browser console that WAM has fixed for you, allowing you to focus on correcting these issues outside of WAM.

settings.content: Set your urls to noindex here.

settings.label: Cookie Policy text
settings.default: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide the best consumer experience.  Continuing to use our site means you agree to our use of cookies.

settings.label: Cookie Policy text link
settings.default: See our cookie policy for more information

settings.content: These will be used in relation to the specific rating given for a Product
